name: Grawwwity
description:
A platformer without gravity and movement locked to up, down, left and right. in other words you can only move horizontally or vertically.

I took some heavy inspiration from VVVVVV

The stage texts uses this font by managore https://managore.itch.io/m5x7

Controls:

Walk with joystick or wasd, pretty basic

Space (A on controller) flips you, reminiscent of VVVVVV in a way

R resets the current level, this is the same on controller
